1.content:
I first noticed it on a break from high-school in my local shopping mall. The store claimed to be an ‘Exotic Crafts and Jewellery’ store however upon entering I was disappointed to find that it meant selling ‘powdered crystals’ and ‘soothing salts’ to gullible people. Having nothing better to do I browsed, hoping to find something nice looking for my girlfriend. While she also didn’t appreciate the ‘mystifying arts’ I knew she would appreciate a small gift.
“Looking for anything in particular?” The clerk, a towering old man who wore a variety of crystals tied to a necklace, appeared behind me and just about gave me a heart attack.
“Uh, yeah I'm just looking for a ring for my girlfriend.” I replied after a moment.
“Ahh, come, over here,” the creep spoke as he turned to a cabinet I hadn’t seen before. Splayed before me were a variety of jewellery pieces, some of which I couldn't even begin to identify. Looking over it all they all looked fairly complex and intricate in their designs and carvings.

“I uh, I don’t think I can afford any of these,” I said, what was with the names? ‘Wishful thinking, Good Fortunes, Hypnotic horror.’ My eyes lingered on the final ring for a moment before he spoke drawing my gaze.
“Nonsense, I can see it in your eyes, you can afford them, and you want one.” His voice grew deeper, demanding almost and he stared into my eyes. I couldn’t look away.
“I’m good thanks, I think I’m going to head out.” I wanted to turn around, to look away but I couldn't make myself. Out of the corner of my eye I could see him reaching for one of the rings, I think it had said something about hypnotism? At last he looked away from me and down to the ring. I’ve never spun around and began walking out of a store so fast in my life.
“You forgot this.” he called, I turned back for a second and saw him holding out his hand, the black and red spiralled ring fitting snugly on his ring finger. His deep brown eyes piercing into my own and that damned ring was the last thing I saw before everything else became hazy.

I… awoke? Out the front of the store, standing, and with a small gift bag in my hand. I quickly opened it up and I saw the dreaded ring. I turned around to head back into the store only to find it had closed… a sign out the front announced that it had been getting renovated for weeks? I looked back to the bag and felt uncomfortable.
“Go… find your girlfriend, give her your new gift.”

11.content:

Her most attractive aspect, considering her modest breast size. Quickly I averted my eyes and for a split second I thought I saw the old man leering at me.
“Sorry… I got distracted by something.”
“You know I’ve been waiting for the week to be over so we can watch this.” Kalosa continued ahead of me and I sped up trying to get beside her. I slipped my hand down into hers forgetting about the small bag in my other hand for the time being.


“Kalosa,” I began, immediately realising I had no follow up to how I wanted to approach this. The movie had been a boring one about some romance between a bunny-girl and a wolf-man. I’d found myself mostly distracted with the sexy girl sitting in my arms, my hands gently roaming her body until she batted them away.
“Yeah?” She looked back up at me from her position nested in my arm, her own arm having snaked its way into my shirt at some point while clinging to my hand. It may have stopped the roaming but it certainly didn’t stop the thoughts, I adjusted myself a few times to try and hide my bulge but I knew it was mostly futile. I kept looking around the room as I heard someone whispering dark fantasies into my ears.
“If you had the power to change anything about me would you do it?” words not my own seemed to fall out of my mouth.
“Why do you ask?” she presses.
“I don’t really know, just something I saw online.” I replied, we sat quietly before she spoke up again,
“Some small things I guess... for example, you know I don't like you looking at me in public.” Her eyes glared up at me and I brought my free hand up behind my head. I felt my fingers brush something paper-y behind my head on the couch. I hadn't left the bag there...
“I’m sorry you just look really sexy…”
“I know but you always do it and I really don’t like it.” Kalosa replied.
‘Give’ her the ring as apologies - the thought entered my brain, seemingly not from my own consciousness.
“I’m sorry.” No you aren’t, you’re just sorry that she wont fuck you tonight. I looked down in shame.
“Please, Vermilion, I’ve told you this before… I don’t like when you look at me like that in public.” You could make her like it. That would be wrong. She said she’d do it. She did… No it’s wrong.
“I don’t want to keep telling you this, please Vermilion. Even throughout this movie you’ve been grabbing at my body, It doesn’t feel good.” Kalosa continued despite my internal dialogue.
Why is it wrong if she’d do it? Because she is speaking hypothetically and only small things. I could feel my reasoning beginning to disappear as I found myself rubbing the outline of the ring.
“And where did you even go at the shops today? I was calling you and you didn’t answer.”
I didn’t hear her question over the voice in my ear.
She said she’d change small things about you, why not make her hornier? Why not make her happy to tease you. That’s small isn’t it?
I guess it is.
And she said it was ok.
I guess she did

113.content:
“Were you even listening to me Vermilion?”
“I was buying you a gift.” The words weren’t my own but as soon as I said them I knew what I would do.
“A gift? Why didn’t you reply.” She asked surprised, curiosity tinged the edges of her voice though.
“My phone died,” I lied, “But did you want to see it?”
“Yes.” She replied temporarily having forgotten our earlier conversation.
My fingers rustled the paper gift-bag as I slid my hand in, fumbling to put on the ring. Wait, when did i learn how to use it? Is that really the question you want to ask now? The voice spoke in my mind as I affixed the ring. Would you not rather ask what you should do to her? I know what I'm doing to her, I’m going to ask her how much she would change when I know she isn’t ‘being nice’ with her reply.

I brought the ring out of the bag and showed it to her. I watched as she gazed deep into the ring.
“Kalosa, can you hear me?” I asked her.
“Yes.” Her reply was short and monotone, with none of the playfulness from before.
“Kalosa, how do you feel?”
“A little tired, Kind of sad from before.”
“From our conversation?”
“Yes, and the movie.” Oh. See, she’s honest now, you could ask her anything and make her not remember it. Like these instructions.
“Kalosa…” She is your toy now, have a little fun.
“If you could hypnotise me into being different, what would you change?”
“Your horniness to begin with, You’re always horny, I love you but it’s too much secondly i'd get rid of your fetishes, I’d also make it so you preferred to dress up with me, you would look so nice dressed up..!”
“Ok Kalosa, that’s enough. Would you make me into your ideal boyfriend?”
“Yes.”
“Kalosa, I want you to touch your nose.” Without a second thought her hand comes flying out of my shirt and onto her nose.

113221.content:
"Finished" Vermillion replied as he hid the ring. Kalosa shook her head for a minute in a half-awake state.
"We need to do that more often." Kalosa spoke first and I felt a load of tension release from myself. I leant back into her bed, the tv looping the title screen of the movie from before. Checking the time her parents would be returning soon from their date.
"Agreed," Vermillion held Kalosa tightly against himself, enjoying her soft skin pressed against his body. Kalosa smirked for a second before leaning up and kissing him passionately.
"As much as i'd love a second round, i'm feeling kind of hungry." Kalosa whispered in a low tone directly into my ear. Letting out a shiver I replied,
"Aren't you still full from dinner? We only ate a few hours ago."
"A little but I could go for an ice-cream at least." Kalosa sat up in bed and looked down at me.
"I guess i could go for an ice-cream." Vermillion replied before he found himself being whisked away to their local MacDonald's.

"You go order, I just want a small sundae." Vermillion told Kalosa as he handed her his credit-card. "I'll go find a spot for us." Not that it was hard to do, being 10pm at night. A small glint of mischievousness appears in Kalosa's eyes but is gone as fast as it appeared.
"Ok, I'll get them to bring it to us." Kalosa walked off to the counter, I swear she was deliberately swinging her hips, I shake my head and turn to find a corner booth, this could get interesting.
She returned a few minutes later smiling innocently at me as she handed back my credit card.
"What took you so long? There wasn't anyone else there?" Vermilion asked her suspiciously,
"Oh... I ordered some extra food... I'll pay you back later." At that moment the counter-clerk approached with a tray of food, on it a family meal.

"Jesus Kalosa, how much did you order?"
"A little, I said I was hungry... but I don't know if i'll be able to finish it all..." She replied looking taken-back by just how much food there was. I rolled my eyes at her as I began to eat my sundae, surrounding her was 6 cheeseburgers of varying size, 4 large fries, 3 more sundaes, and a few large drinks. She took the first double-cheeseburger and happily bit into it.
"Come on, you have one." She held another in my direction.
"Kalosa, i'm still full from earlier." I replied and she looked towards me with wide puppy-dog eyes.
"Fine, i'll have a little." I sighed and brought the proffered burger to my side of the tray as she slid one of the fries to my side.
"Can't have a burger without fries." She smiled innocently as she finished off half the burger in her hand. Vermillion's hand drifted down to his stomach, still a little full from Dinner about an hour ago and he reached for the burger. Quickly he unwrapped it watching Kalosa as she devoured her own like she hadn't eaten since lunch.
"What, i'm a growing girl," she winked towards me as she ate and I just about choked on my mouthful. A groan escaped my lips as i finished the burger, i don't know how much more i could finish. I stared at the fried before me for a minute before i felt a hand on my leg.
"Come on baby, i can't eat all of this myself. Please, eat for me." Kalosa whispered to me, I took a few deep breaths before reaching forward to bring the fries up to my mouth, and slowly i begin to shovel them into my mouth. Kalosa keeps rubbing her hand along my thigh, every once in a while she moves her hand closer to my crouch.

My world has become her hand, the fries in front of me, and how full my stomach is. I feel it resting very lightly against my thighs. How much more can i eat?

info.description:
Vermillion, a typical horny 18 year old with a girlfriend, acquires a magic ring that allows him to bend others to his will. However it appears the ring is not all he acquired that day, a strange voice speaks to him, instructing him further into depravity.

Will he use his powers for good? Probably not, but it’s going to be fun watching him.

I will edit / modify chapters to improve grammar / punctuation when needed.
